special-mentions.title: Special Thanks
special-mentions.description:
We would like to express our deepest gratitude to Mr. Ait Moussa Abdelaziz, our professor and mentor throughout our Master's program at the Faculty of Sciences in Oujda.

His expertise, dedication, and unwavering support played a crucial role in our academic and personal development. Thanks to his insightful guidance and pedagogical approach, we were able to overcome many challenges and acquire the skills needed to excel in our field.

We extend our sincerest thanks to him for his commitment to the success of his students and the inspiration he has provided throughout our journey.
